tasks.label: Check for Deployment Engine
tasks.detail: Checks if the Deployment Engine is cloned as a sibling to the radius repo
args: test -d ../deployment-engine/ || { echo >&2 "The project-radius/deployment-engine is not cloned as a sibling to the radius repo. Please clone the project-radius/deployment-engine repo next to the Radius repo and try again."; exit 1; }

tasks.label: Build Deployment Engine
tasks.detail: Builds the Deployment Engine. This requires the project-radius/deployment engine repo to be cloned as a sibling to the project-radius/radius repo

tasks.label: Build Radius (all)
tasks.detail: Builds the Radius repository using make build
